taskbody.context: You can edit model files at any time.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click on the model file you want to edit.
step.stepresult: The model is opened in the Editor area.

step.cmd: Change the content of the model using the Editor area, Palette menu, or Properties view pane.
step.stepresult: The model is marked as modified in the Editor area by a * located on the left side of the model name.

postreq.note: Models must be edited using Design Studio editors only. Modifying models with a text editor is not supported. Directly changing the Domain Specific Language of models can corrupt them and make them unusable for Design Studio.
